# === Terraform ===
# AI-irrelevant files for Terraform projects
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Provider plugins (huge)
.terraform/

# State files (sensitive + large)
*.tfstate
*.tfstate.*
*.tfstate.backup

# Crash logs
crash.log
crash.*.log

# CLI config
.terraformrc
terraform.rc

# Plan files (binary)
*.tfplan

# Variable override files (local)
*.auto.tfvars
override.tf
override.tf.json
*_override.tf
*_override.tf.json

# Lock file
.terraform.lock.hcl
